column2: With the [emf_duchy.GetFullBaseName] now firmly under the control of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and thus the [Root.Religion.GetName] Faith, it is now considered a de jure part of the [emf_kingdom.GetFullName]. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] watch over [emf_duchy.GetBaseName], now and forever more.
The de jure territory of §Y[emf_kingdom.GetBaseName]§! expands to include §Y[emf_duchy.GetBaseName]§!.\n
